Caption: KAV Pandalai (Director) addressing the audience during the inauguration of Computer Centre . From left Prof.S.Sampath, Prof.A.Ramachandran, Dr. Erhard Eppler(Minister of Cooperation, Federal Republic of Germany), Prof.K.T. Chandy, Chairman Board of Governor.
Album: Album 0227: 1. Special Convocation 2. Computer center 16-11-1973 to 17-11-1973
Event: Special Convocation, Inauguration of Computer Centre
